value.title: Clean, transform, and load data in Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn how to clean, transform, and load data in Power BI.

value.title: Explore fundamentals of data visualization
value.excerpt: Learn the fundamental principles of analytical data modeling and data visualization, using Microsoft Power BI as a platform to explore these principles in action.

value.title: Append and Merge Tables in Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn how to quickly merge and append tables using the query editior in Power BI. Build models with multiple data sources. Contact me on LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/in/gaelimholland

value.title: Add index to subgroups in Power Query
value.excerpt: In today's video, I am going to show you how to add individual  indexes to groups in power query using the M language. #powerquery #powerbi #curbal   Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center  SUBSCRIBE to learn more about Power and Excel BI! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ7UhloHSA4wAqPzyi6TOkw?sub_confirmation=1

value.title: Advanced Concatenate/ Merge columns with Power Query
value.excerpt: Concatenating columns in Power Query is not hard to do, but depending on the technique you use, you might get unexpected or wrong results.  There is a bullet proof way to do it and I will explain it here.  00:00 Intro & Problem description 01:19 How power query concatenates columns with Table.CombineColumns
